H0.text: The Sun has the greatest direct influence on the movement of the lithosphere.

H1.text: The Moon has the greatest direct influence on movement of the lithosphere.

H2.text: Earth's core has the greatest direct influence on movement of the lithosphere.

H3.text: Earth's mantle has the greatest direct influence on the movement of the lithosphere.

A4.text: Dissipation of heat from the mantle is the original source of the energy required to drive plate tectonics through convection or large scale upwelling and doming.

A5.text: Slab pull is therefore most widely thought to be the greatest force acting on the plates.
